text: Sipsey Creek is a stream in the U.S. state of Mississippi. It is a tributary to Tuscolameta Creek. Sipsey is a name derived from the Choctaw language meaning "poplar tree". A variant name is "Turkey Creek". ==References== Category:Rivers of Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Neshoba County, Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Newton County, Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Scott County, Mississippi
title: Sipsey Creek (Tuscolameta Creek tributary)
